survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Sustainability Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction with current workplace sustainability initiatives and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your company's current sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your company's current sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives does your company currently offer? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Green commuting incentives (e.g., bike racks, public transit subsidies)
questions.client_notes: List common sustainability initiatives. Include an 'Other' option to capture unique initiatives.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in workplace sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to measure participation levels. Keep the options clear and mutually exclusive.

questions.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

questions.question_text: To what extent do you believe workplace sustainability initiatives contribute to your overall job satisfaction?
